titles.title: Small Business Jobs Credit Act of 2001
To amend the Internal Revenue Code of 1986 to expand the work opportunity tax credit for small business jobs creation.

action.text: Referred to the House Committee on Ways and Means.

bill.summary: 4/4/2001--Introduced. Small Business Jobs Credit Act of 2001 - Amends the Internal Revenue Code to include a "qualified small business employee" (an employee who is either hired by a qualified small business located in a development zone or who is hired by a qualified small business and who lives in such a zone) as a member of a targeted group for purposes of computing the work opportunity credit.
